verses.name: 2 Samuel 2:11
verses.text: And the time that David was king in Hebron over the house of Judah was seven years and six months.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 2:12
verses.text: And Abner the son of Ner, and the servants of Ish–bosheth the son of Saul, went out from Mahanaim to Gibeon.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 2:13
verses.text: And Joab the son of Zeruiah, and the servants of David, went out, and met together by the pool of Gibeon: and they sat down, the one on the one side of the pool, and the other on the other side of the pool.
